channel.title: Israel National Radio - Torah Tidbits Audio
channel.description: Torah Tidbits Audio offers an uplifting discussion of the weekly Torah parsha and Jewish holidays with a smattering of modern hasidic music. Phil's special persona shines through with his personal anecdotes, love of baseball and old-time radio, and a commitment to Israel and Aliyah. It airs every Thursday from 8:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. Israel time.

image.title: Israel National Radio - Torah Tidbits Audio
image.description: A neo-Zionist perspective on Israel and the Jewish World.
